title: "Logging onto chat service..." ?????? HELP
body:
I'm logged onto League and it says "Logging onto chat service...". I can't see who's online or can't talk in champ select. 
PLEASE HELP

replies.body: Ugh Same problem here, so annoying. im not gonna chance playing a game until its fixed. Please help, riot.
i played a game and it worked
i just had to relog like 6 times and it fixed it
I have the same problem as well.
same problem what up wit dat
Always happens since last patch, takes between 1 and 5 tries reconnect attempts with 1 minute waiting in between until it prompts me that I can try again, before it finally succeeds to connect.
Same, i can't see chat in champ select.
Same thing with me. The worst part is I have a friend in my living room, and his works fine. I only want it to work so we can play together : (
oh, awesome, i'll give it a try.
